article_title: Senate budget has pay raises, funds for salary parity in law enforcement
article_text:

og.description: The Senate Finance Committee on Sunday adopted a two-year budget that would give state employees, state-supported local employees, college faculty and teachers a 2 percent raise this year.
og.title: Senate budget has pay raises, funds for salary parity in law enforcement
